articles.title: World Bank chief predicts climate push can survive Trump
articles.description: Ajay Banga, nominated by President Joe Biden, is expanding the bank's climate portfolio.
articles.content:

Former U.S. President Donald Trump told a crowd in Indianola, Iowa, on Jan. 14, 2024, he'll be president for "four years and beyond," meaning more than the two terms allowed by the U.S. Constitution.
